remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify a method to handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
